## Problem 1

Read the Mr. Trash Wheel dataset.

```{r}
trashweel_df <- 
  read_excel(
    "./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-7-2020-2.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", 
    range = "A2:N535") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls))
```
